[extensions]
keyUsage = keyEncipherment
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[client_extensions]
keyUsage = keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = clientAuth

[wildcard_extensions]
keyUsage = keyEncipherment
subjectAltName = @wildcard_alt_names

[shortname_extensions]
keyUsage = keyEncipherment
subjectAltName = @shortname_alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1 = foreman.example.com

[wildcard_alt_names]
DNS.1 = *.example.com

[shortname_alt_names]
DNS.1 = foreman
